reflectionThemes.title: Trust & Surrender
reflectionThemes.scripture: "Be still, and know that I am God." — Psalm 46:10
reflectionThemes.scripture2: "Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you." — 1 Peter 5:7
reflectionThemes.reflection: Pause. Breathe. Release control and remember who holds your life.

reflectionThemes.title: God's Nearness
reflectionThemes.scripture: "The Lord is near to all who call on him, to all who call on him in truth." — Psalm 145:18
reflectionThemes.scripture2: "Draw near to God, and he will draw near to you." — James 4:8
reflectionThemes.reflection: God isn't distant—you are stepping into His presence right now.

reflectionThemes.title: Thanksgiving & Praise
reflectionThemes.scripture: "Enter his gates with thanksgiving, and his courts with praise; give thanks to him and praise his name." — Psalm 100:4
reflectionThemes.scripture2: "Rejoice always, pray continually, give thanks in all circumstances." — 1 Thessalonians 5:16–18
reflectionThemes.reflection: Start with gratitude—what has He done for you today?

reflectionThemes.title: Purity of Heart
reflectionThemes.scripture: "Create in me a clean heart, O God, and renew a right spirit within me." — Psalm 51:10
reflectionThemes.scripture2: "Search me, God, and know my heart; test me and know my anxious thoughts." — Psalm 139:23
reflectionThemes.reflection: Before speaking to God, invite Him to cleanse and realign your heart.
